title: [Minecraft.net |CULTURE] 来见见冰雪公主吧!
author: 无情丶mmmmm
txt_content:
本帖最后由 无情丶mmmmm 于 2020-2-18 06:52 编辑 





file_1581621044000.jpg (113.54 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-2-14 03:10 上传





MEET THE ICE PRINCESS!来见见冰雪公主吧!She’s frosty and fabulous冷艳且高贵It’s not often a build freezes us in our tracks so elegantly, but that’s exactly what happened with Riddeh’s “Ice Princess”! It only took a quick glance at this build to know there was no doubt we would feature it on Minecraft.net for everyone to get inspired by!一般来说，一座建筑并不能引得我们驻足而观。但Riddeh的“冰雪公主“却用她的优雅做到了！看了一眼我就明白她值得被放在minecraft.net上来迷倒每一个人！
This entire build is around 1100 x 1100 to max height blocks, including the Ice Princess and her nearby castle. According to Riddeh, the project took a couple of months. We were fortunate enough to get one of the first looks at this dazzling wintery display via FeatureMe@minecraft.net not long after it was completed!冰雪公主和她附近的城堡总共占地1100*1100*255，据Riddeh说这个项目花了他几个月的时间。我们很幸运能第一时间就在FeatureMe@minecraft.net上见证这位冰山美人的诞生。
We applaud the attention to even the smallest details, from the various shades of blue in the necklace giving it an icy glow, to the palace nearby looking chilly yet inviting to visit, and the overall visual illusion of being caught in a snowstorm. Fortunately, it doesn’t look like a severe storm, but still just enough to provide wind and snow flurries. Maybe it’s magic!值得赞赏的是，Riddeh对待这位公主可真是一丝不苟----哪怕是在小的细节他都精益求精。不同层次的蓝色赋予她胸前的项链荧荧之光；而她身旁的城堡也并非只是“花架子”，内部精巧的设计随时欢迎我们前去游览。建筑整体更是营造了让人仿佛置身风雪之中的视觉幻景。幸运的是，这并不是什么狂风暴雪，反而恰到好处得提供了风和小雪。我想，这就是魔法吧！

This Ice Princess has warmed our hearts for sure, Riddeh, and we look forward to seeing your future builds! Now that we’ve seen winter, will her spring sister be too far behind? We hope so!冰雪公主毋庸置疑的温暖了每一个人的心。Riddeh，我们都很期待能够在未来再次一睹你的杰作！我们历经了寒冬，那么春天姐姐离我们还会远吗？
sending some screenshots and information to FeatureMe@minecraft.net, and you might just see your creation featured here on Minecraft.net!将截图和信息发送到FeatureMe@minecraft.net, 你的作品也有机会在minecraft.net上展示！
原文链接：https://www.minecraft.net/zh-hans/article/meet-ice-princess-发布时间：2020年1月9日原文作者：Nova Barlow译者：无情丶mmmmm

replies.author: GCVillager
replies.txt_content:
我们很幸运地在它完成后不久就在FeatureMe@minecraft.net网站上看到这个耀眼的冰展的第一眼!
这句话有点奇怪
我只想说，这个建筑皮肤好黑啊……非洲人？？？

replies.author: E.T.星落辰
replies.txt_content: 一般来说黑皮和综皮不应该是冰雪主题的肤色啊，按照自然原理它们都是不搭的。作者是zz正确思路？
这个冰雪公主皮肤这么黑

replies.author: Xiao2
replies.txt_content:
E.T.星落辰 发表于 2020-2-15 11:50
一般来说黑皮和综皮不应该是冰雪主题的肤色啊，按照自然原理它们都是不搭的。作者是zz正确思路？ ...
反衬美
关键是白发和肤色要有对照。
整体上色调是非常不错的。白-棕-蓝

replies.author: upo
replies.txt_content: 黑色肤色不太符合但造的不错
我觉得不应该把肤色变白一点吗
